00026 #include "brisawebfile.h"
00027 
00028 #ifdef USE_NEW_BRISA_WEBSERVER
00029 
00030 BrisaWebFile::BrisaWebFile(const QString &fileName, QObject *parent) :
00031         BrisaWebService(parent),
00032         m_fileName(fileName)
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 BrisaWebFile::~BrisaWebFile()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 QString BrisaWebFile::fileName() const
00041 {
00042     return m_fileName;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void BrisaWebFile::setFile(const QString &fileName)
00046 {
00047     m_fileName = fileName;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void BrisaWebFile::onRequest(const HttpRequest &request,
00051                              BrisaWebserverSession *session)
00052 {
00053     HttpResponse response(request.httpVersion());
00054 
00055 //    response.setHeader("Content-Type", ); // TODO
00056     QFile *file = new QFile(m_fileName);
00057     file->open(QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00058     resoponse.setEntityBody(file);
00059 
00060     session->respond(response);
00061 }
00062 
00063 #else // !USE_NEW_BRISA_WEBSERVER
00064 
00065 using namespace BrisaCore;
00066 
00067 BrisaWebFile::BrisaWebFile(QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sm, QString filePath,
00068         QObject *parent) :
00069     QxtAbstractWebService(sm, parent) {
00070     file = new QFile(filePath);
00071     if (!file->open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text))
00072         throw "Could not open file for read.";
00073 }
00074 
00075 BrisaWebFile::~BrisaWebFile() {
00076     delete file;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void BrisaWebFile::pageRequestedEvent(QxtWebRequestEvent *event) {
00080     QxtWebPageEvent *c = new QxtWebPageEvent(event->sessionID,
00081             event->requestID, file->readAll());
00082     c->contentType = "text/xml";
00083     postEvent(c);
00084     file->reset();
00085 }
00086 
00087 #endif // USE_NEW_BRISA_WEBSERVER
